Title: Building an AI Literate Team (from AI Knowhow)
Description:
Are you ready to lead your company into the future with confidence and foresight? Today, we're bringing you an episode of Knownwell's new podcast, AI Knowhow, to help you unravel all of the potential mysteries of adapting to our new AI era. 

First, Host Courtney Baker is joined by Knownwell executives David DeWolf and Mohan Rao to talk about how to assess your organization's readiness for AI transformation in seven distinct areas. After that, AI and cybersecurity expert Andrew DeBerry speaks with Knownwell's Pete Buer about the importance of strategic leadership and utilizing unique data in adopting AI in businesses. Andrew also talks about how important it is for companies to prioritize ethics and transparency in order to navigate upcoming AI regulations effectively.

Of course, at the top of the show, we have our rapid-fire news segment. And, at the end, we'll look back to the past to understand our future. 

Take your free AI Readiness Assessment at https://knownwell.com/assessment.

For more information on Andrew DeBerry, find him on LinkedIn at linkedin.com/in/deberry.

AI Knowhow is presented to you by the team at Knownwell. Visit www.knownwell.com for more information about how they can help you leverage the power of AI to drive profitability.

For more about the podcast, visit www.knownwell.com/podcast.
